appDescription: Your AI-powered guide to understanding your symptoms and finding help near you.
symptomCheckerDescription: Describe your symptoms and get instant AI-powered insights into possible conditions.
nearbyClinicsDescription: Use your location to find the nearest clinics and hospitals for professional medical assistance.
settingsDescription: Manage your theme and language preferences.
medicineCheckerDescription: Enter a medicine name to get information about its uses, side effects, and dosage.
enterLocationPrompt: Enter a location to search manually.
locationPlaceholder: e.g., city, address, or pin code
skinAnalyzerDescription: Upload a photo of a skin condition for an AI-based analysis and suggestions.
dietPlannerDescription: Get a personalized weekly meal plan from our AI based on your health goals.
mentalHealthCompanionDescription: Chat with our supportive AI for mental wellness guidance and exercises.
firstAidGuideDescription: Get instant, step-by-step AI guidance for common first-aid emergencies.
healthArticlesDescription: Read AI-curated articles on wellness, common illnesses, and health tips.
emergencySOSDescription: Alert your emergency contacts with your location in a critical situation.
